(ROOT
  (PP (IN As)
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN number))
      (PP (IN of)
        (S
          (VP (VBG blog)
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (NNS posts))
                (VP (VBZ approaches)
                  (NP (DT the)
                    (ADJP
                      (QP (CD one) (CD thousand)))
                    (NN mark))))))))
      (, ,))))


root(ROOT-0, As-1)
det(number-3, the-2)
pobj(As-1, number-3)
prep(number-3, of-4)
pcomp(of-4, blog-5)
nsubj(approaches-7, posts-6)
ccomp(blog-5, approaches-7)
det(mark-11, the-8)
number(thousand-10, one-9)
num(mark-11, thousand-10)
dobj(approaches-7, mark-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ amazes)
      (NP (PRP me))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (EX there))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (ADVP (RB still))
            (NP
              (NP
                (ADJP (RB so) (JJ many))
                (JJ new) (NNS places))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT that))
                (S
                  (VP (VBP are)
                    (ADVP (RB still))
                    (VP (VBG waiting)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB be)
                            (VP (VBN discovered))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(amazes-2, it-1)
root(ROOT-0, amazes-2)
dobj(amazes-2, me-3)
mark(are-6, that-4)
expl(are-6, there-5)
ccomp(amazes-2, are-6)
advmod(are-6, still-7)
advmod(many-9, so-8)
amod(places-11, many-9)
amod(places-11, new-10)
nsubj(are-6, places-11)
nsubj(waiting-15, that-12)
aux(waiting-15, are-13)
advmod(waiting-15, still-14)
rcmod(places-11, waiting-15)
aux(discovered-18, to-16)
auxpass(discovered-18, be-17)
xcomp(waiting-15, discovered-18)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Indeed))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Indeed-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Singapore))
    (VP (MD might)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP (DT a) (JJ tiny) (JJ red) (NN dot))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(dot-7, Singapore-1)
aux(dot-7, might-2)
cop(dot-7, be-3)
det(dot-7, a-4)
amod(dot-7, tiny-5)
amod(dot-7, red-6)
root(ROOT-0, dot-7)


(ROOT
  (PRN (CC but)
    (SBAR (IN if)
      (S
        (NP (DT the) (NN world) (NNS atlas))
        (VP (VBD were)
          (VP (VBN drawn)
            (PP (VBG according)
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN number))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (JJ great) (NNS eats))))
                (, ,)))))))))


cc(drawn-7, but-1)
mark(drawn-7, if-2)
det(atlas-5, the-3)
nn(atlas-5, world-4)
nsubjpass(drawn-7, atlas-5)
auxpass(drawn-7, were-6)
root(ROOT-0, drawn-7)
prep(drawn-7, according-8)
pcomp(according-8, to-9)
det(number-11, the-10)
pobj(to-9, number-11)
prep(number-11, of-12)
amod(eats-14, great-13)
pobj(of-12, eats-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP reckon)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (MD should)
            (ADVP (IN at) (JJS least))
            (VP (VB be)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN size))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT a) (CD one) (NN dollar) (NN coin)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(reckon-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, reckon-2)
nsubj(size-9, we-3)
aux(size-9, should-4)
advmod(size-9, at-5)
pobj(at-5, least-6)
cop(size-9, be-7)
det(size-9, the-8)
ccomp(reckon-2, size-9)
prep(size-9, of-10)
det(coin-14, a-11)
num(coin-14, one-12)
nn(coin-14, dollar-13)
pobj(of-10, coin-14)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN After)
      (NP
        (NP (NN blogging))
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP
            (NP (NN hawker) (NN food))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (CD three) (NNS years)))))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, After-1)
pobj(After-1, blogging-2)
prep(blogging-2, about-3)
nn(food-5, hawker-4)
pobj(about-3, food-5)
prep(food-5, for-6)
det(years-10, the-7)
amod(years-10, last-8)
num(years-10, three-9)
pobj(for-6, years-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP find)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NN list))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NNS places)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB visit)))))))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADVP (RB still))
            (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ long))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(find-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, find-2)
mark(long-13, that-3)
poss(list-5, my-4)
nsubj(long-13, list-5)
prep(list-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, places-7)
aux(visit-9, to-8)
infmod(places-7, visit-9)
cop(long-13, is-10)
advmod(long-13, still-11)
advmod(long-13, quite-12)
ccomp(find-2, long-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT A) (NN lot))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT this))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ due)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ intrepid) (NN group))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN makan) (NNS kakis)))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VB scour)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN island))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP (JJ great) (NNS places))))
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB eat)
                        (CC and)
                        (RB then) (VB post)
                        (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ own) (NNS reviews)
                          (CC and)
                          (NNS pics))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (DT the) (NN forum)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(lot-2, A-1)
nsubj(due-6, lot-2)
prep(lot-2, of-3)
pobj(of-3, this-4)
cop(due-6, is-5)
root(ROOT-0, due-6)
prep(due-6, to-7)
poss(group-10, our-8)
amod(group-10, intrepid-9)
pobj(to-7, group-10)
prep(group-10, of-11)
nn(kakis-13, makan-12)
pobj(of-11, kakis-13)
nsubj(scour-15, who-14)
rcmod(group-10, scour-15)
det(island-17, the-16)
dobj(scour-15, island-17)
prep(island-17, for-18)
amod(places-20, great-19)
pobj(for-18, places-20)
aux(eat-22, to-21)
xcomp(scour-15, eat-22)
cc(eat-22, and-23)
advmod(eat-22, then-24)
dep(eat-22, post-25)
poss(reviews-28, their-26)
amod(reviews-28, own-27)
dobj(eat-22, reviews-28)
cc(reviews-28, and-29)
conj(reviews-28, pics-30)
prep(eat-22, in-31)
det(forum-33, the-32)
pobj(in-31, forum-33)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (SBAR (IN that)
      (S
        (NP (PRP we))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (NP
            (NP (DT another)
              (QP (CD thousand)
                (CC or)
                (RB so))
              (NNS members))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (DT the) (NN facebook) (NN group)))))
        (, ,)))))


root(ROOT-0, Now-1)
mark(have-4, that-2)
nsubj(have-4, we-3)
dep(Now-1, have-4)
det(members-9, another-5)
num(members-9, thousand-6)
cc(thousand-6, or-7)
conj(thousand-6, so-8)
dobj(have-4, members-9)
prep(members-9, in-10)
det(group-13, the-11)
nn(group-13, facebook-12)
pobj(in-10, group-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB do)
              (NP (NN list)))))))
    (VP (MD will)
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (VP (VB keep)
        (S
          (VP (VBG getting)
            (ADVP (RBR longer))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(keep-7, the-1)
aux(do-3, to-2)
infmod(the-1, do-3)
dobj(do-3, list-4)
aux(keep-7, will-5)
advmod(keep-7, just-6)
root(ROOT-0, keep-7)
xcomp(keep-7, getting-8)
advmod(getting-8, longer-9)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (RB So) (JJ ,)))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (JJ many) (NNS thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP
        (NP (NN everyone))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP have)
              (VP (VBN written)
                (PRT (RP in))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB recommend)
                      (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ favorite) (NN food) (NNS haunts))))))))
          (, ,))))))


amod(thanks-2, many-1)
root(ROOT-0, thanks-2)
prep(thanks-2, to-3)
pobj(to-3, everyone-4)
nsubj(written-7, who-5)
aux(written-7, have-6)
rcmod(everyone-4, written-7)
prt(written-7, in-8)
aux(recommend-10, to-9)
xcomp(written-7, recommend-10)
poss(haunts-14, their-11)
amod(haunts-14, favorite-12)
nn(haunts-14, food-13)
dobj(recommend-10, haunts-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you) (NNS guys))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBP keep)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN blog))
        (VP (VBG going))))
    (. .)))


dep(guys-2, you-1)
nsubj(keep-4, guys-2)
advmod(keep-4, really-3)
root(ROOT-0, keep-4)
det(blog-6, the-5)
dobj(keep-4, blog-6)
partmod(blog-6, going-7)
